name: dhis-ssa-csd-loader
description: openinfoman-dhis ---------------- This web application make use of OpenInfoMan and the DHIS2 adapter.  You can easily install on Ubuntu 14.04 and 15.10 using the following commands   sudo add-apt-repository ppa:openhie/release   sudo apt-get update   sudo apt-get install openinfoman-dhis
author: Carl Leitner
